org.springframework.data.redis.core

接口 ReactiveGeoOperations<K,M>


  • public interface ReactiveGeoOperations<K,M>
    Reactive Redis operations for geo commands.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0
    另请参阅:
    Redis Documentation: Geo Commands

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Mono<Long> add(K key, Iterable<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>> locations)
      Add RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocations to key
      Mono<Long> add(K key, Map<M,org.springframework.data.geo.Point> memberCoordinateMap)
      Add Map of member / Point pairs to key.
      Mono<Long> add(K key, org.springframework.data.geo.Point point, M member)
      Add Point with given member name to key.
      Flux<Long> add(K key, org.reactivestreams.Publisher<? extends Collection<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>>> locations)
      Add RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocations to key
      Mono<Long> add(K key, RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M> location)
      Add RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation to key.
      Mono<Boolean> delete(K key)
      Removes the given key.
      Mono<org.springframework.data.geo.Distance> distance(K key, M member1, M member2)
      Get the Distance between member1 and member2.
      Mono<org.springframework.data.geo.Distance> distance(K key, M member1, M member2, org.springframework.data.geo.Metric metric)
      Get the Distance between member1 and member2 in the given Metric.
      Mono<List<String>> hash(K key, M... members)
      Get Geohash representation of the position for one or more members.
      Mono<String> hash(K key, M member)
      Get Geohash representation of the position for one or more members.
      Mono<List<org.springframework.data.geo.Point>> position(K key, M... members)
      Get the Point representation of positions for one or more members.
      Mono<org.springframework.data.geo.Point> position(K key, M member)
      Get the Point representation of positions for one or more members.
      Flux<org.springframework.data.geo.GeoResult<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>>> radius(K key, org.springframework.data.geo.Circle within)
      Get the members within the boundaries of a given Circle.
      Flux<org.springframework.data.geo.GeoResult<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>>> radius(K key, org.springframework.data.geo.Circle within, RedisGeoCommands.GeoRadiusCommandArgs args)
      Get the members within the boundaries of a given Circle applying RedisGeoCommands.GeoRadiusCommandArgs.
      Flux<org.springframework.data.geo.GeoResult<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>>> radius(K key, M member, org.springframework.data.geo.Distance distance)
      Get the members within the circle defined by the members coordinates and given radius applying Metric.
      Flux<org.springframework.data.geo.GeoResult<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>>> radius(K key, M member, org.springframework.data.geo.Distance distance, RedisGeoCommands.GeoRadiusCommandArgs args)
      Get the members within the circle defined by the members coordinates and given radius applying Metric and RedisGeoCommands.GeoRadiusCommandArgs.
      Flux<org.springframework.data.geo.GeoResult<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>>> radius(K key, M member, double radius)
      Get the members within the circle defined by the members coordinates and given radius.
      Mono<Long> remove(K key, M... members)
      Remove the members.

      • add

        Mono<Long> add(K key,
               org.springframework.data.geo.Point point,
               M member)
        Add Point with given member name to key.
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        point - must not be null.
        member - must not be null.
        返回:
        Number of elements added.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: GEOADD
